extensionDescription.message: Collect Article And Read it Later

ai_tip.message: You need fill OpenAI API key in settings.

label_useai.message: Use AI(Auto Generate Title, Summary, Judge Ad)

prompt1.message: Assume you're an expert tasked with summarizing technical blog content. Given the following article, return a JSON string containing the fields { title, summary, isAd }. These fields represent the title, summary, and a boolean indicating whether the content is likely an advertisement. The title should be within 20 words, the summary within 80 words, and isAd should be either true or false.
